CustomField.description: Displays the number of answers that are populated in the answer
CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Answer_A__c)), 1, 0) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Answer_B__c)), 1, 0) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Answer_C__c)), 1, 0) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Answer_D__c)), 1, 0) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Answer_E__c)), 1, 0) + IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Answer_F__c)), 1, 0)
CustomField.label: Num Answers
